About Us

A project built with passion and teamwork üíª‚ú®

We are a group of students from IIT Indore who came together to build something meaningful using the power of Artificial Intelligence. This project is part of our learning journey, where we explored real-world applications of AI in video and photo editing.

Our goal was to create a simple and effective tool that allows users to easily remove backgrounds, erase unwanted objects, and enhance media using modern AI techniques.

We collaborated as a team ‚Äî dividing work between frontend, backend, model integration, and design ‚Äî and supported each other throughout the development process.
